import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function QuizStart(){const[level,setLevel]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleContinue=()=>{if(!level){alert("Please select your education level");return;}// Navigate based on selected level
if(level==="10th"){navigate("/quiz/10th");}else if(level==="intermediate"){navigate("/quiz/intermediate");}else if(level==="college"){navigate("/quiz/college");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quiz-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Select Your Education Level"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"radio-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",name:"level",value:"10th",onChange:e=>setLevel(e.target.value)}),"10th Standard"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",name:"level",value:"intermediate",onChange:e=>setLevel(e.target.value)}),"Intermediate (11th\u201312th)"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",name:"level",value:"college",onChange:e=>setLevel(e.target.value)}),"B.Tech / College"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"continue-btn",onClick:handleContinue,children:"Continue"})]});}export default QuizStart;
